name: 千雪
text:
はい、到着～♪
ここ、私の大好きな手芸屋さんなの
trans:
We've arrived～♪
This is my favorite handicrafts store.

name: 甘奈
text: すごーい！　かわいー小物もいっぱいあるー！
trans: Wooow! There's a lot of cute accessories tooー!

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
きれいなのも……いっぱい……！
trans:
Yeah...
There's a lot... of pretty stuff...!

name: 甘奈
text:
こういうお店、あんまり来たことないから、
テンション上がるね！
trans:
I don't usually go to stores like this, so I'm getting 
really excited!

name: 千雪
text:
素敵でしょう？
私、お店ごと全部欲しくなっちゃうの
trans:
Isn't it wonderful?
I personally end up wanting everything they have.

name: 甘奈
text:
ち、千雪さん……
それはムリだよー！
trans:
C-Chiyuki-san...
That's just impossibleー!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、無理かなぁ
trans: Fufu, I wonder if it is.

name: 甜花
text:
甜花……
お、奥のほうも……見たい……
trans:
Tenka...
Wants to see... what's inside too...

name: 千雪
text:
ええ、行きましょう
人が多いから……甜花ちゃん、気をつけてね
trans:
Yeah, let's go.
There's a lot of people so... Tenka-chan, be careful.

name: 甘奈
text:
大丈夫！
甜花ちゃんの手、しーっかり握ってるから☆
trans:
It'll be fine!
I'm holding Tenka-chan's hand as tightly as possible, 
so☆

name: 千雪
text:
じゃあ、心配ありませんね
出発～
trans:
Then there's nothing to worry about.
Let's go～

name: 甘奈
text:
……わぁ、このビーズもいいしー
ボタンもすっごくかわいー
trans:
...Wow, these beads are really niceー
And the buttons are super cute tooー

name: 千雪
text:
甜花ちゃんはどう？
……それ、すごくじっくり見てるのね
trans:
How about you, Tenka-chan?
...It seems like you're really focused on that one.

name: 甜花
text:
あわわ……
こ、これは……その……
trans:
Awawa...
T-This is... Uhm...

name: 千雪
text:
すごく、ポップでおしゃれ
甜花ちゃんぽい柄だなって思うわ
trans:
That one's really popular and trendy.
I think it really fits Tenka-chan's style.

name: 甜花
text:
でも……課題、学校の……
だから……だめかな……
trans:
But... The assignment's... for school...
So... Maybe not...

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ
課題のことは、あんまり気にしないで
trans:
Fufu.
Don't think about your assignment too much.

name: 千雪
text: 本当に、好きなものを選んでほしいの
trans:
To be honest, I really want you to pick out what you 
like.

name: 千雪
text: 千雪先生のアドバイスです♪
trans: That's advice from your teacher Chiyuki♪

name: 甜花
text:
う……うん……！
わかった……！
trans:
O-Okay...!
I understand...!

name: 甘奈
text:
ち、千雪さん……
そんなに買うの……！
trans:
C-Chiyuki-san...
Are you really buying that much...!?

name: 千雪
text:
そう……なの……
よいしょ……
trans:
That's... right...
Heave-ho...!

name: 甜花
text:
わ……
お……落ちる……！
trans:
Wah...
I-It's going to topple over...!

name: 千雪
text:
きゃあ！
……あ、ありがとう、甜花ちゃん！
trans:
Kyaa!
...T-Thank you, Tenka-chan!

name: 千雪
text:
今日はふたりがいるから
つい、嬉しくなっちゃって
trans:
Today, I have the two of you with me so I might have 
enjoyed myself too much...

name: 甜花
text:
千雪さん……
なんだか、楽しそう……
trans:
Chiyuki-san...
It seems like, you're having a lot of fun...

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、なんか意外ー
千雪さんのかわいー一面発見ー☆
trans:
Yeah, it's a bit surprisingー
We've discovered one of Chiyuki-san's cute sidesー☆

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈、荷物持つの手伝うよー！
trans: Amana will help you carry your stuffー!

name: 千雪
text:
まぁ、ありがとう～
でも、荷物を持つのも楽しいのよ
trans:
Oh my, I'm grateful～
But you know, carrying them is also part of the fun.

name: 千雪
text: ほら、おっきなトートバッグを持ってきたから♪
trans: Look, I brought a big tote bag with me for it♪

name: 甘奈
text:
うわ～
千雪さんって、ほんとに雑貨のプロなんだねー……！
trans:
Wow～ Chiyuki-san, you're really a pro at sundries, 
aren't youー...!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、さあ、お会計して帰りましょう
ふたりが買ったもの、早く見たいな……！
trans:
Fufu, now then, let's go pay for these and go home.
I can't wait to see what you two bought...!

name: 千雪
text: す、すごい人ね……！
trans: T-There sure are a lot of people...!

name: 甘奈
text: やばいねー、もろ帰宅ラッシュだー……
trans: This is preeeetty bad, it's already rush hourー...

name: 甘奈
text:
……甜花ちゃん、大丈夫？
顔色悪いよ……？
trans:
... Tenka-chan, are you alright?
You're looking a bit pale, you know...?

name: 千雪
text:
まあ、本当！
人に酔っちゃったのかしら……
trans:
Oh my, you're right!
I wonder if she's had too much of crowds today...

name: 甘奈
text:
気をつけてたんだけど……
ごめんね
trans:
We've been taking care not to but...
I'm sorry.

name: 千雪
text: 少し、休みましょう
trans: Let's rest for a bit.

name: 甜花
text:
だ、大丈夫……
ちょっと……びっくり、しちゃった……
trans:
I-I'm alright...
I was... just a bit surprised...

name: 甘奈
text: でも……心配だよ、甜花ちゃん……
trans: But... We're worried about you, Tenka-chan...

name: 千雪
text:
そうね、無理はだめ
……ちょっと、この花壇に座らせてもらいましょう
trans:
That's right, you shouldn't push yourself.
...Let's sit around this flower bed for a bit.

name: 千雪
text:
お花さん、お隣り失礼します～
さあ、甜花ちゃん
trans:
Sorry for the intrusion, flowers～
Now come here, Tenka-chan.

name: 甜花
text: あうぅ……
trans: Awh...

name: 千雪
text:
じゃあ、一緒に深呼吸するわよ
せーの
trans:
Now then, let's go and take deep breaths together.
One, andー

name: 千雪
text: 吸って……
trans: Breathe in...

name: 甜花
text: す、すーっ
trans: P-Phewー

name: 千雪
text: 吐きましょう
trans: And then let it out.

name: 甜花
text: は、はーっ
trans: H-Haaー

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka-chan...

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……ありがとう……
trans: Naa-chan... Thank you...

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さんも……
trans: Chiyuki-san too...

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、
甜花ちゃん、すごくがんばってくれてたのね……
trans:
It's no big deal,
since Tenka-chan's been doing her best...

name: 千雪
text: 今日は、連れ回しちゃってごめんなさい
trans: I'm sorry for dragging you along today.

name: 甜花
text:
だ、大丈夫……！
甜花……もう、歩ける……
trans:
I-It's fine...!
Tenka... can walk already...

name: 甜花
text:
それに……
なーちゃんと、千雪さんといて……
trans:
Besides...
Being here with Naa-chan, and Chiyuki-san...

name: 甜花
text: 今日……た、楽しかった……！
trans: Today... h-has been fun...!

name: 千雪
text: まあ……！
trans: Oh dear...!

name: 甘奈
text: えへへっ、甜花ちゃん……
trans: Ehehe, Tenka-chan...

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ……はい
手、つなご！
trans:
In that case... Here!
Let's hold hands!

name: 甜花
trans: O-Okay...!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、それじゃあ──
trans: Fufu, well thenー

name: 千雪
text: こっちの手は、私とつなごう？
trans: Why don't you hold mine with this hand?

name: 甜花
text: わ、ち、千雪さん……
trans: Wah, C-Chiyuki-san...

name: 甘奈
text:
わーい
３人つなぎだー☆
trans:
Yaaay!
All three of us are connectedー☆

name: 千雪
text: ３人つなぎだー♪
trans: A three-man linkー♪

name: 甜花
text:
にへへ……
さ、さんにん……つなぎだ……！
trans:
Nihehe...
I-It's a three-man... link...!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、
じゃあ、帰りましょうね～
trans:
Fufu,
With that, let's go home～

name: 甜花
trans: Y-Yes...!

name: 甘奈
text: うん！
trans: Yup!

name: 千雪
text:
今日は、素敵なものがいっぱい
手に入ったわ
trans:
Today, I got my hands on
a lot of lovely things.

name: 千雪
text: ありがとう……
trans: Thank you...
